sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_cmdb_ws.CMDBWsInsightClientUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Utility methods related to insight accessible for client side filters.</description>
        <name>CMDBWsInsightClientUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CMDBWsInsightClientUtil = Class.create();
CMDBWsInsightClientUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.util = new sn_cmdb_ws.CMDBWsInsightUtil();
    },

    getCloudFilters: function() {
        return this.util.getCloudFilters(true);
    },

    getNonCloudFilters: function() {
        return this.util.getNonCloudFilters(true);
    },

    type: 'CMDBWsInsightClientUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-12-09 17:58:55</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>96aacd27eb2b511094bbb5d5d8522888</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CMDBWsInsightClientUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="CMDB Workspace" source="sn_cmdb_ws">c8ab76825371201032b7ddeeff7b1280</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="CMDB Workspace">c8ab76825371201032b7ddeeff7b1280</sys_scope>
